Class Couch::Table
In: src/couchdb/table.rb
Parent: Object

Wrapper for working with CouchDb’s table data

Couch tables are stored queries of Couch’s document space. A table definition contains a selection filter and one or more columns. This object represents the result of connecting to a defined Couch table and asking for its contents.

Methods
